Verses: 1 simson Thimnaaththukkup Poi, Thimnaaththile Pelistharin Kumaaraththigalil Oru Pennaik Kandu,
2 thirumba Vandhu, Than Thaayaiyum Thagappanaiyum Nokki: Thimnaaththile Pelistharin Kumaaraththigalil Oru Pennaik Kanden; Avalai Enakkuk Kollavendum Endraan.

3 appozhudhu Avan Thaayum Avan Thagappanum Avanai Nokki: Nee Poi, Viruththasedhanamillaadha Pelistharidaththil Oru Pennaik Kollavendiyadhenna? Un Sagodhararin Kumaaraththigalilum, Engal Janamanaiththilum Pen Illaiyaa Endraargal. Simson Than Thagappanai Nokki: Aval En Kannukkup Piriyamaanaval, Avalaiye Enakkuk Kollavendum Endraan.
4 avan Pelistharidaththil Kutram Pidikka Mugaandharam Undaagumpadi, Idhu Karththarin Seyal Endru Avan Thaayum Thagappanum Ariyaadhirundhaargal; Akkaalaththile Pelisthar Isravelai Aandaargal.

5 appadiye Simsonum Avan Thaayum Thagappanum Thimnaaththukkup Pogap Purappattaargal; Avargal Thimnaadh Oor Dhraatchaththottangalmattum Vandhapodhu, Idho, Kerchchikkira Paalasingam Ondru Avanukku Edhiraaga Vandhadhu.

6 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aavi Avanmel Balamaai Iranginadhinaal, Avan Than Kaiyil Ondrum Illaadhirundhum, Adhai Oru Aattukkuttiyaik Kizhiththuppodugiradhupol Kizhiththup Pottaan; Aanaalum Thaan Seydhadhai Avan Than Thaai Thagappanukku Arivikkavillai.
7 avan Poi Andhap Pennode Pesinaan; Aval Simsonin Kannukkup Piriyamaayirundhaal.
8 silanaalaikkuppinbu, Avan Avalai Vivaagampannath Thirumbivandhu, Singaththin Udalaip Paarkkiradharku Vazhivilagip Ponaan; Idho, Singaththin Udalukkulle Theneekkoottamum Thenum Irundhadhu.

9 avan Adhaith Than Kaigalil Eduththu, Saappittukkonde Nadandhu, Than Thaaithagappanidaththil Vandhu, Avargalukkum Koduththaan; Avargalum Saappittaargal, Aanaalum Thaan Andhath Thenai Singaththin Udalile Eduththadhai Avargalukku Arivikkavillai.
10 avan Thagappan Andhap Pen Irukkum Idaththil Ponapodhu, Simson Ange Virundhuseydhaan; Vaalibar Appadi Seyvadhu Vazhakkam.
11 avargal Avanaik Kandapodhu, Avanodekooda Irukkumpadi Muppadhu Thozharai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaargal.

12 simson Avargalai Nokki: Oru Vidukadhaiyai Ungalukku Sollugiren; Adhai Neengal Virundhungira Ezhunaalaikkulle Kandupidiththu Enakku Viduviththaal, Naan Ungalukku Muppadhu Thuppattigalaiyum Muppadhu Maatru Vasthirangalaiyum Koduppen.

13 adhai Enakku Viduvikkaadhe Ponaal, Neengal Enakku Muppadhu Thuppattigalaiyum Muppadhu Maatru Vasthirangalaiyum Kodukkavendum Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Un Vidukadhaiyai Sollu; Naangal Adhaik Ketkattum Endraargal.
14 appozhudhu Avan: Patchikkiravanidaththilurundhu Patchanamum, Balavaanidaththilirundhu Madhuramum Vandhadhu Endraan; Andha Vidukadhai Avargalaal Moondru Naalmattum Viduvikkak Koodaadhe Poyitru.

15 ezhaamnaalile Avargal Simsonin Pensaadhiyaip Paarththu: Un Purushan Andha Vidukadhaiyai Engalukku Viduvikkumpadikku Nee Avanai Nayam Pannu; Illaavittaal Naangal Unnaiyum Un Thagappan Veettaiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththuppoduvom; Engalukkullavaigalaip Pariththukkollavaa Engalai Azhaiththeergal Endraargal.

16 appozhudhu Simsonin Pensaadhi Avanukku Munbaaga Azhudhu, Nee Ennai Nesiyaamal Ennaip Pagaikkiraai, En Janangalukku Oru Vidukadhaiyai Sonnaai, Adhai Enakkaavadhu Viduvikkavillaiye Endraal; Adharku Avan: Idho, Naan En Thaaithagappanukkum Adhai Viduvikkavillaiye, Unakku Adhai Viduvippeno Endraan.

17 virundhungira Ezhunaalum Aval Avan Munbaaga Azhudhukonde Irundhaal; Ezhaamnaalile Aval Avanai Alattikkondirundhapadiyaal, Adhai Avalukku Viduviththaan; Appozhudhu Aval Than Janangalukku Andha Vidukadhaiyai Viduviththaal.

18 aagaiyaal Ezhaamnaalile Pozhudhu Pogumunne, Andha Oor Manushar Avanai Nokki, Thenaippaarkkilum Madhuramaanadhu Enna, Singaththaippaarkkilum Balamaanadhum Enna Endraargal; Adharku Avan: Neengal En Kidaariyaal Uzhaadhirundheergalaanaal, En Vidukadhaiyaik Kandupidippadhillai Endraan.

19 karththarudaiya Aavi Avanmel Iranginadhinaal, Avan Askalonukkuppoi, Avvooraaril Muppadhuperaikkondru, Avargaludaiya Vasthirangalai Urindhukonduvandhu, Vidukadhaiyai Viduviththavargalukku Andha Maatru Vasthirangalaik Koduththu, Kobam Moondavanaaip Purappattu, Than Thagappan Veettukkup Poivittaan.
20 simsonin Pensaadhiyovendraal, Avanudaiya Thozharil Avanode Snegamaayirundha Oruvanukkuk Kodukkappattaal.
